data.title: Maps & Directions
data.text:
From Charlottesville:

Take Route 20 South to U.S. 15 South; follow U.S. 15 South to Farmville; turn left onto Business 15/460 at the stop light (Executive Inn); proceed several miles and turn right onto Business 15 (Oak Street) at Centra Southside Community Hospital. At the traffic light, turn left onto High Street. The Admissions Office is located in Radcliff Hall at 310 Buffalo Street. Parking is available in the visitor lot adjacent to the building.

From Danville:

Follow U.S. 58/360 E to South Boston; take a left to continue on U.S. 360 E; continue onto U.S. 15 North to Farmville; follow signs to Longwood University, turning left onto High Street, the fourth traffic light after the Longwood playing fields. The Admissions Office is located in Radcliff Hall at 310 Buffalo Street. Parking is available in the visitor lot adjacent to the building.

From Hampton/Newport News:

Take I-64 West to I-95 South, turn onto the downtown expressway (Route 195); take the expressway to the Powhite Parkway (Route 76); take Powhite Parkway to Route 288 (Chesterfield/Amelia), follow Route 288, exit onto U.S. 360 West. Take 360 West approximately 35 miles to State Route 307, take Route 307 for 9 miles to U.S. 460 West. Exit 460 at the second Farmville exit (Business U.S. 15 North), follow the signs to Longwood, turning left onto High Street, the fourth traffic light after the Longwood playing fields. The Admissions Office is located in Radcliff Hall at 310 Buffalo Street. Parking is available in the visitor lot adjacent to the building.

From Lynchburg/Roanoke:

Take U.S. 460 East into Farmville. Exit 460 at the second Farmville exit (Business U.S. 15 North), follow the signs to Longwood University, turning left onto High Street the fourth traffic light after the Longwood playing fields. The Admissions Office is located in Radcliff Hall at 310 Buffalo Street. Parking is available in the visitor lot adjacent to the building.

From Norfolk/Virginia Beach:

Take I-64 West to Richmond and follow the Richmond directions or take U.S. 460 West to Farmville. Exit 460 at the second Farmville exit (Business U.S. 15 North), follow the signs to Longwood, turning left onto High Street the fourth traffic light after the Longwood playing fields. The Admissions Office is located in Radcliff Hall at 310 Buffalo Street. Parking is available in the visitor lot adjacent to the building.

From Northern Virginia, Richmond, Washington D.C. and northern states:

Take I-95 South to Powhite Parkway (Exit 79). Take Powhite Parkway to Route 288 (Chesterfield/Amelia), follow Route 288, exit onto U.S. 360 West. Take 360 West approximately 35 miles to State Route 307, take Route 307 for 9 miles to U.S. 460 West. Exit 460 at the second Farmville exit (Business U.S. 15 North), follow the signs to Longwood, turning left onto High Street, the fourth traffic light after the Longwood playing fields. The Admissions Office is located in Radcliff Hall at 310 Buffalo Street. Parking is available in the visitor lot adjacent to the building.

From Raleigh-Durham Airport:

Follow I-40 West towards Durham/Chapel Hill. Take the NC-147 North exit, exit number 279 B, towards Durham/Downtown. Follow 147 North to I-85 North. Follow I-85 North to US Route 15 North (Oxford exit). Follow 15 North to Farmville; follow signs to Longwood, turning left onto High Street, the fourth traffic light after the Longwood playing fields. The Admissions Office is located in Radcliff Hall at 310 Buffalo Street. Parking is available in the visitor lot adjacent to the building.
